articles.author: Ivan Mehta
articles.title: Apple’s iOS 26 with the new Liquid Glass design is now available to everyone - TechCrunch
articles.description: Other features include a call screening assistant, a new gaming and preview app, in-app translation across the system, and updates to Genmoji and Image Playground apps.
articles.content: Apple’s iOS 26 software update for iPhones is available Monday to people who have an iPhone 11, iPhone SE 2, and later. iOS 26’s marquee feature is Apple’s Liquid Glass design, which includes element… [+7082 chars]
